name: Cr1me
description: CR1ME decodes Solana transactions into clean, readable summaries. Aggregates context across wallets, programs, tokens, and NFTs (so you see related accounts, mints, metadata) Has spam filtering, consistent naming of instructions, compact layouts to emphasize signal over noise You can search by wallet address, program ID, or transaction signature Shows metadata lookup for mints (logos, standards) when available Lightweight, shareable pages (minimal UI chrome)
